data.title: The Movie Filmed in Antalya Operation Fortune is in Vision on January 13
meta_keywords: The Movie Filmed in Antalya Operation Fortune is in Vision on January 13
data.meta_description: The Movie Filmed in Antalya Operation Fortune is in Vision on January 13
data.text:
Operation Fortune is the new Hollywood-made movie of the famous director Guy Ritchie, who brought a new breath to the action genre with productions such as Sherlock Holmes, Rocknrolla, Transporter and Snatch. The movie will be released on January 13.

The cast of the film, starring Jason Statham, Hugh Grant, Aubrey Plaza and Josh Hartnett; In addition to names such as Cary Elwes, Bugzy Malone, famous Turkish actors Kaan Urgancıoğlu, Turkish-German actors Timur Seyfettin Ölmez, Ozan Ayhan, Ergun Kuyucu and Aksel Üstün, who received the best actor award in Spain in recent years, known as Tim Seyfi.

Turkish Dubbed Trailer Also Released

The Turkish-dubbed trailer of the movie Operation Fortune (Operation Fortune), whose previously released trailers had over a million views on social media, was also released. In the comments of the trailer of the movie published on digital media, the audience shares the excitement of seeing director Guy Ritchie, who has worked together on many action films, and Jason Statham, a master actor who has achieved great success in the world, together once again.

The Whole World Will Watch the Beauties of Antalya

Operation Fortune was shot in Antalya and includes magnificent images of the city, the action scenes in the Kaleiçi region, Aqueduct, EXPO area and Cumhuriyet Square, as well as the 2,000-year-old Aspendos Antique Theatre, seem to impress the whole world. In addition to the images of Antalya, the film also includes scenes of Turkish culture and dialogues in Turkish.

Kaan Urgancıoğlu is in the same movie as Hollywood stars

Successful actor Kaan Urgancıoğlu, who has made a name for himself with his projects recently, plays a mafia leader named "Casa" in the movie. The action scenes shot with Jason Statham and the successful acting of Urgancıoğlu are eye-catching.

The action-comedy Operation Fortune is one of the highest-budget productions of recent times with a budget of over 130 million dollars, Jason Statham, who plays a special agent Orson Fortune, together with his team, to eliminate a deadly weapon that threatens the world. The billionaire goes after an arms dealer. He also recruits one of Hollywood's biggest movie stars to help him with this undercover mission.

Tim Seyfi appears before the audience in the role of Alexander

Tim Seyfi, who most recently made a name for himself with his roles in Osman Sekiz directed by Ezel Akay and his roles in the critically acclaimed Atiye TV series, appears in front of the audience with the character of Alexander, the right-hand man of Greg Simmonds, the gun trader played by Hugh Grant in the movie Operation Fortune.

"Operation Fortune", whose Turkey license rights belong to BG Film and whose distribution is undertaken by CJ ENM, will be in theatres on January 13 with Turkish dubbing and subtitles.
